posts.title: Welcome to InfoVerve
posts.author: Admin
posts.excerpt: Welcome to InfoVerve, a modern professional blogging platform built with cutting-edge web technologies. Discover how to create, manage, and share your ideas with the world.
posts.content:
# Welcome to InfoVerve

Welcome to **InfoVerve**, your new home for professional blogging! This platform is designed to make content creation and management simple, elegant, and powerful.

## Features

### Modern Design
InfoVerve features a clean, modern design that adapts beautifully to any device. Whether your readers are on desktop, tablet, or mobile, they'll enjoy a seamless reading experience.

### Dark Mode Support
Switch between light and dark themes with a single click. The theme preference is saved automatically, ensuring a consistent experience across visits.

### Powerful Search & Filtering
Find content quickly with our intuitive search functionality and category filters. Readers can easily discover the content they're looking for.

### Interactive Features
- **Star Ratings**: Readers can rate articles with a 5-star system
- **View Counter**: Track how many people have read each post
- **Social Sharing**: Share posts on Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook
- **Comments**: Engage with readers through GitHub Issues-powered comments

### Easy Content Management
The admin panel makes creating and managing posts a breeze. Write in Markdown, preview your posts, and manage everything from one place.

## Getting Started

To start blogging:

1. Visit the [Admin Panel](admin.html)
2. Create your first post
3. Download the generated JSON file
4. Update `data/posts.json` in your repository
5. Commit and push to GitHub Pages

## Markdown Support

Write naturally with Markdown syntax:

```javascript
// Code blocks are beautifully formatted
const greeting = 'Hello, World!';
console.log(greeting);
```

> Blockquotes stand out and draw attention to important information.

**Bold text** and *italic text* help emphasize key points.

## What's Next?

Start creating amazing content and building your audience. InfoVerve gives you all the tools you need to succeed.

Happy blogging! ðŸš€

posts.title: Markdown Guide for Bloggers
posts.author: Admin
posts.excerpt: Master Markdown syntax to write beautiful, well-formatted blog posts. This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know.
posts.content:
# Markdown Guide for Bloggers

Markdown is a lightweight markup language that makes writing for the web easy and intuitive. This guide will teach you everything you need to create beautiful blog posts.

## Basic Formatting

### Headings

```markdown
# Heading 1
## Heading 2
### Heading 3
```

### Text Styling

- **Bold text**: `**bold**` or `__bold__`
- *Italic text*: `*italic*` or `_italic_`
- ***Bold and italic***: `***text***`
- ~~Strikethrough~~: `~~text~~`

## Lists

### Unordered Lists

```markdown
- Item 1
- Item 2
  - Nested item
  - Another nested item
- Item 3
```

### Ordered Lists

```markdown
1. First item
2. Second item
3. Third item
```

## Links and Images

### Links

```markdown
[Link text](https://example.com)
```

### Images

```markdown
![Alt text](image-url.jpg)
```

## Code

### Inline Code

Use backticks for `inline code`.

### Code Blocks

```javascript
function greet(name) {
  return `Hello, ${name}!`;
}
```

## Blockquotes

> This is a blockquote.
> It can span multiple lines.

## Tables

| Feature | Description | Status |
|---------|-------------|--------|
| Search | Find posts | âœ“ |
| Comments | GitHub Issues | âœ“ |
| Ratings | 5-star system | âœ“ |

## Tips for Great Blog Posts

1. **Start with a strong headline** - Make readers want to click
2. **Use headings to organize** - Break up long content
3. **Add images** - Visual content increases engagement
4. **Keep paragraphs short** - Easier to read on screens
5. **End with a call to action** - Encourage engagement

## Conclusion

Markdown makes writing content simple and enjoyable. With these basics, you're ready to create professional blog posts that look great and are easy to read.

Happy writing!

posts.title: Hosting Your Blog on GitHub Pages
posts.author: Admin
posts.excerpt: Learn how to deploy and host your InfoVerve blog for free using GitHub Pages. A step-by-step guide for beginners.
posts.content:
# Hosting Your Blog on GitHub Pages

GitHub Pages offers free, reliable hosting for static websites. Here's how to deploy your InfoVerve blog.

## Prerequisites

- A GitHub account
- Your InfoVerve blog files
- Basic Git knowledge

## Step 1: Create a Repository

1. Go to [GitHub](https://github.com)
2. Click "New repository"
3. Name it `username.github.io` (replace username with your GitHub username)
4. Make it public
5. Don't initialize with README

## Step 2: Push Your Code

```bash
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Initial commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/username/username.github.io.git
git push -u origin main
```

## Step 3: Enable GitHub Pages

1. Go to your repository settings
2. Navigate to "Pages" section
3. Select "main" branch as source
4. Click "Save"

## Step 4: Configure Your Blog

Update the Utterances configuration in `post.html`:

```html
<script src="https://utteranc.es/client.js"
        repo="username/username.github.io"
        issue-term="pathname"
        theme="preferred-color-scheme"
        crossorigin="anonymous"
        async>
</script>
```

## Step 5: Create Posts

1. Visit `https://username.github.io/admin.html`
2. Create your first post
3. Download the generated `posts.json`
4. Replace `data/posts.json` in your repository
5. Commit and push

## Updating Your Blog

Every time you create or edit a post:

```bash
git add data/posts.json
git commit -m "Update blog posts"
git push
```

Your changes will be live in a few minutes!

## Custom Domain (Optional)

1. Buy a domain from any registrar
2. Add a `CNAME` file to your repository with your domain
3. Configure DNS records:
   - A record: 185.199.108.153
   - A record: 185.199.109.153
   - A record: 185.199.110.153
   - A record: 185.199.111.153

## Conclusion

Congratulations! Your blog is now live and accessible to the world. Start creating amazing content and building your audience.

**Your blog URL**: `https://username.github.io`
